title: Home Page Loads Successfully
description: Verify that the home page loads correctly and displays content
steps: Wait for page to load completely
Verify page title and content are visible
Check that banner and featured products are displayed
expected_result: Home page loads with banner and featured products visible

title: Navigation Menu Functional
expected_result: Successfully navigates to catalog page with products visible

title: Product Catalog Displays Products
description: Verify product catalog shows products correctly
steps: Check product images, names and prices are visible
expected_result: Products are displayed with proper formatting and details

title: Product Detail Page Loads
description: Verify product detail page shows complete information
steps: Check product details, images and options are visible
expected_result: Product detail page shows complete product information

title: Add to Cart from Product Detail
description: Verify products can be added to cart
steps: Check that product appears in cart
expected_result: Product added to cart successfully and cart drawer opens

title: Side Cart Opens and Displays Items
steps: Verify side cart drawer opens automatically
Verify product quantity and price shown
expected_result: Side cart displays added product with correct details

title: Navigate to Checkout
expected_result: Navigates to checkout page with order summary

title: Login Page Loads
steps: Check email and password fields exist
expected_result: Login page displays email and password fields with submit button

title: Register Page Loads
expected_result: Registration page displays required fields and submit button

title: Profile Page Access
expected_result: Profile page shows user information and account options

title: Order History Access
expected_result: Order history shows past orders with details

title: Admin Login Page Loads
description: Verify admin login page displays correctly
steps: Verify admin login form is visible
Check email and password fields exist
expected_result: Admin login page displays correctly with authentication form

title: Protected Routes Require Authentication
description: Verify admin routes redirect to login when not authenticated
steps: Try to access /admin/dashboard without logging in
Verify redirect to admin login page
Check that protected content is not accessible
expected_result: Redirected to admin login page, protected route blocked

title: Bottom Navigation Visible
description: Verify bottom navigation bar is present and functional
steps: Verify bottom navigation bar is present
expected_result: Bottom navigation displays with all icons and is functional

title: Flower Animation Visible
description: Verify flower animation renders on pages
steps: Wait for page to load completely
Check animation is smooth and non-intrusive
expected_result: Flower animation renders on page without issues
